attributes.action: Remove all known terrorist and religious extremist from our country NOW
attributes.additional_details:
Remove all known terrorists and religious extremist that are knowingly living in our country

Anyone that invites racial and religious hatred should have their human right to live in this country with their family taken away

All fanatical extremist with views that put our country, kids and family in danger should be a criminal offence not freedom of speech, it should be an act of treason if you are living in our country

PLEASE LISTEN TO THE PEOPLE OF THIS COUNTRY AND ACT NOW

IF YOU DON'T ACT ALL OF OUR CHILDREN AND FAMILY INCLUDING YOURS WILL BE IN SERIOUS DANGER

DEPORT THEM ALL NOW
